Key Match Events: Kieffer Moore scored the first goal for Wales within 37 seconds.
Harry Wilson scored the second goal for Wales at 3 minutes.
Driton Camaj scored for Montenegro at 73 minutes.
Karl Darlow made several key saves to preserve Wales' lead.
Stevan Jovetić's diving header was saved by Karl Darlow.
Vladimir Jovović's shot hit the post and Nikola Krstović missed an open goal.
Post-Match Reflections: Kieffer Moore expressed happiness and described the match as tough and gruelling.
Craig Bellamy praised his team for holding on despite difficult conditions.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in very wet conditions, affecting the gameplay.
Wales' victory in Montenegro was described as part of the 'Craig Bellamy revolution'.
